154
Even now, \93unto the principalities and the powers in the heavenly places\94 is \93made known through the church the manifold wisdom of God.\94 And He \93hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places: . . . that in the ages to come He might show the exceeding riches of His grace in His kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.\94 Ephesians 3:10, RV; 2:6, 7.
